name: Singapore Telecommunications
overview: Singapore Telecommunications Limited engages in the operation and provision of telecommunication systems and services in Singapore, Australia, and internationally. The company offers mobile, broadband, and fixed line services; home entertainment services; IT services; business network, Internet, and subscription TV services; and data and info-communications technology services, as well as satellite services. It also provides administrative, technical, and advisory services; service support for computer hardware and software, and other information technology related services; technical and management consultancy services; finance and treasury services; and facilities management and consultancy services, as well as distributes specialized telecommunications, data communication products, and prepaid mobile products. In addition, the company involves in the venture capital investments in startup technology and telecommunications companies; provision of satellite capacity for telecommunications and video broadcasting services; ownership and chartering of barges and provision of storage facilities for submarine cables and related equipment; and development and management of online Internet portal. Further, it offers handset insurance and related services; narrow band portal content services; equipment rental services; interactive television and broadcasting related services; IT disaster recovery services; system integration, and software research and development services; information technology training and software resale services; infotainment products and services; and general liaison and support services, as well as operates a call centre for telecommunications services. The company was founded in 1879 and is headquartered in Singapore, Singapore.

milestones.description: SingTel To Establish $150.5M Venture Capital Fund
